item.title: DEEPS Cores
item.description: What Are Marine Heatwaves? Marine heatwaves are prolonged periods of warmer-than-usual temperatures at the surface of the ocean. What Are Their Impacts On Marine Ecosystems? Fish and mammals can be impacted by a rise in temperature. What Does The Future Hold?
